channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16723] RMI registry is not destroyed after stopping JMX Connector Server
item.description:
We are creating RMI registry in JMXListener.startConnectorServer() ,


    // Create the RMI registry

    LocateRegistry.createRegistry(rmiRegistryPort);

This registry is never deregistered, should be destoyed after stopping JMX Connector server.
item.summary: RMI registry is not destroyed after stopping JMX Connector Server

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Simple patch, please review.
I think we should deregister RMI registry when there is an error to start JMXConnectorServer also. WDYT ?
Thanks for the review Ashish Singhi. Yes, you are right, addressed that in V2 patch.
lgtm
